messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Why Not?  By Hathor the CowGoddess
messages.msgSnippet: I LOVE it!  I think I ll buy a copy of it with some of my birthday money!  A special treat for Mom, but really...for ALL of us! When my family started on this
messages.messageBody:
I LOVE it! I think I'll buy a copy of it with some of my birthday money! A special treat for Mom, but really...for ALL of us!

When my family started on this radical unschooling journey some time ago, one of the first things I read was an article on saying YES, or some form of yes. I'm not sure now who wrote it...I *am* pretty sure I read it on Sandra's site. Anyway, it *really* stuck with me. I kinda turned it into my own little mantra...

So, thanks for sending it Mary Ellen!

Paige in VA

nellebelle <nellebelle@...> wrote:

Mary Ellen
